page.title: 11ORCHARD FARM.
page.content: Orchard Farm is situated on the main route to Glasgow from the area around Dunoon.The farm is a group of buildings near the Cothouse Garage.The farm only employs 4 people. Orchard Farm is a dairy farm, which takes up 214 acres. 56 acres of the land belonging to Orchard Farm is used for grazing. All the cows at Orchard Farm are British Fresians which are very good milk producers. At Orchard Farm there are 170 cows, 100 are milking cows and the rest are young stock. In one week at Orchard Farm they produce 1820 gallons of milk and 20 gallons of cream.They now produce semi-skimmed milk . They take 12 gallons of milk semi-skim it and they end up with 11 gallons of semi-skimmed milk and 1 gallon of cream.
